title: Nia - The Origin
description: A past erased, soulmates separated, emerging psychic abilities. Solving the mystery of Nia’s origin will be a dangerous adventure.Nia is a mystery to everyone, including herself. With no memory of her life before the age of ten, she grows up as an outcast in the Florida swamps. As she turns seventeen, she begins having visions of a boy from her past and discovers that she has unique psychic abilities. When her foster father dies in a mysterious accident, she’s unexpectedly dropped into a world of wealth and privilege in the Bahamas.She begins to fall for Christopher, a charismatic painter, but soon her life is threatened, and they are forced to go on the run. Traveling to the New Orleans French Quarter, they discover the boy from Nia’s past. He also has no memory of his youth and has abilities like hers. Nia is drawn to him through a magnetic connection unlike anything she’s experienced before. Hunted by a dangerous man, their quest for answers leads them to Mexico. The trio must then work together to uncover the shocking truth of Nia’s origin.
author: Rachel Bourne
